subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Blake Griffin scored 44 points — many on electrifying dunks — but the Knicks, behind Amar’e Stoudemire and Danilo Gallinari, held on for the win.
snippet: Blake Griffin scored 44 points — many on electrifying dunks — but the Knicks, behind Amar’e Stoudemire and Danilo Gallinari, held on for the win.
